TopicTitle: VAB/SPH not letting me place parts...

Articles.Content: I've been working on this huge mobile rover base with the Kethane, Karbonite, and Extraplanetary Launchpads mods and when I spawned it onto the runway, the entire left side was missing, save for a drill which was missing on the other side. I tried to fix it in the SPH to no avail, instead, it wouldn't even let me re-place the parts. I've tried re-installing the game and I'm having the same issues. This didn't happen with the H.U.L.K.K. I, only the H.U.L.K.K. II
